005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
017
018import java.util.List;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021
022public final class FnStartsWith {
023  private static final String NAME = "starts-with";
024  @NonNull
025  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
026      .name(NAME)
027      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
028      .deterministic()
029      .contextDependent()
030      .focusIndependent()
031      .argument(IArgument.builder()
032          .name("arg1").type(IStringItem.class)
033          .zeroOrOne()
034          .build())
035      .argument(IArgument.builder()
036          .name("arg2")
037          .type(IStringItem.class)
038          .zeroOrOne()
039          .build())
040      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
041      .returnOne()
042      .functionHandler(FnStartsWith::execute)
043      .build();
044
045  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
046  @NonNull
047  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
048      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
049      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
050      IItem focus) {
051    IStringItem arg1 = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
052
053    IStringItem arg2 = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true));
054
055    return ISequence.of(IBooleanItem.valueOf(
056        fnStartsWith(
057            arg1 == null ? "" : arg1.asString(),
058            arg2 == null ? "" : arg2.asString())));
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Determine if the string provided in the first argument contains the string in
063   * the second argument as a leading substring.
064   * <p>
065   * Based on the XPath 3.1 <a href=
066   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-starts-with">fn:starts-with</a>
067   * function.
068   *
069   * @param arg1
070   *          the string to examine
071   * @param arg2
072   *          the string to check as the leading substring
073   * @return {@code true} if {@code arg1} starts with {@code arg2}, or
074   *         {@code false} otherwise
075   */
076  public static boolean fnStartsWith(@NonNull String arg1, @NonNull String arg2) {
077    boolean retval;
078    if (arg2.isEmpty()) {
079      retval = true;
080    } else if (arg1.isEmpty()) {
081      retval = false;
082    } else {
083      retval = arg1.startsWith(arg2);
084    }
085    return retval;
086  }
087
088  private FnStartsWith() {
089    // disable construction
090  }
091}
